casebody.data:
Maria VAUGHAN
v.
Lindsay MASHBURN, M.D. and Lakeshore Women's Specialists, PC No. 42PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Patricia P. Shields, Attorney at Law, Josh Neighbors, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Travis E. Collum, Attorney at Law, Mooresville, Kevin M. Duffan, Attorney at Law, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorney at Law, for Vaughan, Maria. Harold Holmes, Attorney at Law, Bradley K. Overcash, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, John D. Branson, Attorney at Law, for Mashburn, Lindsay (M.D.), et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 10th of February 2017 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
